title: FTX is investigating a potential hack
description: More than $400 million appears to be missing from the crypto currency exchange, following a bankruptcy filing on Friday.

title: Baby boomers can’t stop staring at their phones
description: Even grandparents can struggle with screen time. Here's how to help them put down their phones and be more present.

title: Layoff spree in Silicon Valley spells end of an era for Big Tech
description: Tens of thousands of tech workers lost their jobs this week as pandemic overspending, high interest rates and recession fears hit home.
